name: T-Pose Simulator
description:
The world has been invaded by Death Monsters!

The only way to save the world is to T-Pose to show the Death Monsters that you are superior!

Use WASD to move, and T to T-Pose!

This game uses the songs Alpha Channels, Thermal, and Buscuits by Evan King.

https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio
https://twitter.com/EvanKingAudio
You can buy his songs at: https://evanking.bandcamp.com
Or grab it as a free download at: https://www.evankingmusic.com
